ygData.subject: Re: Hymn of Restoration
ygData.msgSnippet: ... I don t know.  It didn t always behave like this.  I did the exact same experiment in beta with different results.  Who cares really, I m just reporting
ygData.messageBody:
Greg wrote:
>
> From: "Greg" <sylvan1@...>
>
> I don't know where the hell you were in Beta but the song is exactly the
> same. I did the same combo at lower levels. Hell at 15th level I was soloing
> 3 Fire Elementals at a time in Lava with that song. If you try it make sure
> you are wearing decent armor (chain or better).
> Kolin

I don't know. It didn't always behave like this. I did the exact same
experiment in beta with different results. Who cares really, I'm just
reporting how it works now, for sure, because some people, most
importantly (to me) me, have been saying otherwise.

Jyzan
